title: South Africa : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: In general Number of users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2022 and 2023.
The highest Number of users in millions, of value 19.8 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest Number of users in millions, of value 16.2 was reported at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall Number of users in millions has increased over the Year.
